rules.description: (Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Change Hyper + H/J/K/L to Arrow Keys, X to forward delete
Change Fn + Hyper + H/J/K/L to Home / Page Down / Page Up / End

manipulators.description: Change caps_lock to control. Escape if no other key used.

rules.description: Change Fn + H/N/E/I to Arrow Keys

manipulators.description: Change caps_lock to control. Escape if no other key used.

rules.description: Change Hyper + H/J/K/L to Arrow Keys
Change Fn + H/J/K/L to Arrow Keys
